{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Xiaomi |model=MiWiFi 3 |revision=Pro (R3P) |series=AC2600 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |est_release_date= |fcc_date=08/22/2017 |fcc_id=2AIMRMIWIFIR3P |type=wireless router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621A |cpu1_cspeed=880 MHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=ESMT |fla1_model=F59L2G81A-25T |ram1=512 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM6GE16EWXD-12H |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=3 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Xiaomi_XXXX,Xiaomi_XXXX_5G |default_ssid_regex=^Xiaomi_[A-F0-9]{4}$ |default_ip=192.168.31.1 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Xiaomi MiWiFi 3 Pro (R3P)}} :[http://www.mi.com/miwifir3p/ Product page] (CN)
*[https://openwrt.org/toh/xiaomi/xiaomi_r3p_pro ''Xiaomi R3P'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[http://bigota.miwifi.com/xiaoqiang/rom/r3p/miwifi_r3p_firmware_daddf_2.13.65.bin Dev FW] *[[List of Xiaomi Wireless Devices]]
